template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a retail chain that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Design a retail customer support workflow that routes and resolves simple inquiries automatically, escalates complex cases, and tracks performance metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt under 40 words describing a retail support workflow with specific elements. Need to include triage, auto-resolution for simple issues, escalation for complex cases, and performance tracking. 

The core challenge is packing all required components into a tight sentence without exceeding the word limit. Retail context must be clear upfront. 

Using "customer inquiries" covers both calls and messages. "Route and resolve automatically" implies triage and simple case handling. "Escalate complex cases" checks that box. "Track performance" satisfies the last requirement. 

Counting the words: 20 total, well under the limit. The structure flows logically from intake to resolution to metrics.
